title: Mesh projection surface is not flat/square
description: The 3D projection mesh applies rotation distortion (rotateX: 10°, rotateY: -2°, rotateZ: 4° at lines 64-66) making the text surface appear non-orthogonal. Verify: (1) Whether perspective transform should be applied only to glow/bloom, (2) If base text mesh needs flat geometry, (3) Current transform matrix calculation in render pipeline
notes:
Summary: Removed rotation distortion from the 3D projection mesh. The base text mesh now renders on a flat, orthogonal surface without perspective transform.

Analysis results:
1. Verified perspective transform was applied to the base text mesh via rotateX (10°), rotateY (-2°), rotateZ (4°) in computeCameraVertices
2. Determined that with glow/bloom effects removed, the base text mesh should be flat
3. Confirmed transform matrix calculation was working correctly; rotations were simply locked to 0

Changes:
- Set rotateX, rotateY, rotateZ parameters to 0 (was 10, -2, 4)
- Commented out rotation slider bindings in debug UI to indicate they're locked
- Scale, translate, and origin parameters remain functional for future adjustments

Commit: a7bc56e0bed47230d5c77c9102d88693716ec9b3 fix(spinner-verbs-generator-b9o): remove rotation distortion from text mesh projection

title: Not all PixiJS layers using native rendering path
description: Investigate whether text, glow, and LCD effect layers are properly configured for optimal rendering. Check: (1) Layer render target setup (Canvas vs DOM rendering paths), (2) Whether mask/filter layers use native DRP where possible, (3) Resolution multiplier impact on native rendering (line 72: resolutionMult: 0.25)
notes:
Summary: Investigated and optimized PixiJS layer rendering configuration for native DRP (Dynamic Resolution Path). Enabled native text rendering on spinner, verb, ellipsis, and meta text layers. Optimized LCD subpixel overlay and dead pixels layer with SCALE_MODES.NEAREST for crisp native rendering. Configured glare overlay with LINEAR scaling. Set RenderTexture to use native nearest-neighbor scaling. Documented resolution multiplier impact (0.25 at 2x DPR = 0.5 native resolution) which reduces overhead while maintaining text quality via SimpleMesh camera projection.

Commit: 7f96aedb4df729efdc31772ac16abf056a8088b7 fix(spinner-verbs-generator-mts): optimize PixiJS layers for native rendering path

title: LCD effect not displaying
description: The LCD effect is enabled in params (lcdEnabled: true at line 75) but not visually showing on render. Check: (1) LCD rendering pipeline in PixiJS, (2) Whether LCD filter/shader is applied to text container, (3) Dead pixels effect interaction (line 76)
notes:
Summary: Fixed LCD effect not displaying by moving it and other overlays to a stage-level container instead of including them in the contentContainer that gets rendered to a RenderTexture. This ensures the overlays are applied after the RenderTexture upscaling, preserving the LCD pattern tiling and MULTIPLY blend mode.

Commit: 78a1ec936474edc0247731abdfdcaa1e8854bf60 fix(spinner-verbs-generator-xxm): render LCD effect as stage overlay instead of contentContainer
